last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: So Ran is shocked to find out that Jae Bum has left her on the same day that she finds out that she is pregnant... Ah Jung and Ki Joon have a sweet but awkward reunion after being apart for more than a month and finally talks of marriage is in the air but things turn complicated when Ah Jung misses an important appointment with Ki Joon's aunt.

name: Lie to Me
overview: Gong Ah-jung, a level 5 Ministry of Culture official, gets entangled in a web of lies when she mistakenly lies that she's married to Hyun Ki-joon, a hotel manager from an affluent family. Their relationship is further complicated when Ki-joon's ex-fiancée and a close friend of his brother's, Oh Yoon-joo, reappears in his life.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In this episode, we learn the beginnings of the show start with Ah Jung, a civil servant, was betrayed by her best friend who took her lover. After awhile, she accidentally meets Hyun Ki Joon a charming man. After some confusion, her friend thinks Ah Jung married Hyun Ki Joon.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Park Hoon goes to meet Lawyer Jung Choi Go and sees him being intimidated by a wild middle aged woman. Meanwhile, Ki Joon starts to be aware of people's eyes. The employees get confused when Ki Joon issues rigorous instructions to trace the false rumor.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Ah Jung feels unpleasant by So Ran's impudent manner, so she calls Ki Joon, "Honey". Ki Joon gets stunned and Ah Jung runs away. Later, Ah Jung happens to come to the hotel for lunch and hides her face with her hair and clothes as much as she can...

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: In this episode, Ah Jung tries to disguises herself again. Though, this time while running from the door to the elevator, Sang Hee sees her and cannot help but smile. Later, Park Hoon tells Ki Joon about what Ah Jung has been up to and it surprises him greatly.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: In this episode, Ah Jung and Ki Joon ride together on a swan boat, but after the ride Ah Jung broke it to Ki Joon that they wouldn't see each other again. Afterwards, Ah Jung went shopping with So Ran who was shopping for her and her fake husband.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: It's lunch time, but Ah Jung remained alone in the office, looking for perfect recipe for the housewarming party. It didn't seem that she was forced to do so. She looked quite excited doing it. Ah Jung and Ki Joon went for looking a house because Ki Joon said that he would not lend her his house for housewarming party. While looking around, Ki Joon tried to fix everything that he found wrong.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Believe it or not, but Ah Jung and Ki Joon kiss in this episode. The moment they were secretly hiding for each other came true at the housewarming party. Moments later, they are welcomed to a surprise at the front door. Meanwhile, Sang Hee and Yoon Joo get sentimental.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: In this episode, Ki Joon is sent to the hospital after collapsing. It's an odd sight to see Yoon Joo, Sang Hee, and Ki Joon in the same room together. While the awkwardness passed, Ah Jung showed up suddenly and Yoon Joo started to become suspicious.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Ki Joon got mad at the board members of World Hotel, yelling and throwing papers at the company's seniors, saying that since when the Golden Resort is their playing ground. After everyone left, he was staring at his cell phone and got a phone call from Yoon Ju. Rejecting her proposal to have a lunch seemed to make him feel somewhat disturbed. And Manager Park caught him being like that. Then the phone rang again; it was Yoon ju, again. While he was hesitated to answer that, the door opened and Yoon ju came in, smiling, with her cell phone on the ear. While they were ...

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Ki Joon walked out the restaurant without paying attention to Ah Jung, but his face took on a set expression. Next day, Ah Jung bumped into Manager Park in the lobby. Since Manager Park caught Ah Jung and Ki Joon holding hands the day before, Ah Jung felt awkward in front of her. Fortunately, Manager Park pretended that she didn't see anything, so Ah Jung felt somewhat relieved.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: In this episode, Ki Joon accompanies Ah Jung on a trip to Jeju Island. Ki Joon gets sea sickness on the boat ride, but Ah Jung tends to him until they arrive. Ki Joon has many things waiting for Ah Jung when they get there, such as a limo.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: In this episode, Ah Jung was unpleasantly reminded of Yoon Joo by finding a tiara in her bag. While pondering the tiara, Ki Joon called her and she immediately felt better. Later, there is a World Hotel board meeting on upcoming investments and budget plans.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: In this episode, Ki Joon and Ah Jung have a great day of rest and relaxation. They play fight and ignore the world going around them. At one point, one of Ah Jung's coworkers got yelled at by their boss, but Ah Jung didn't even notice.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: When Ki Joon arrived, news reporters waiting for him in an airport rushed in and started to ask questions about his fake marriage. While he managed to avoid all of the fuss and got in his car, Ah Jung was revealing everything in front of Ki Joon's office. So Ran saw Ah Jung's face in a news program, saying that one female civil servant has spread malicious rumors about World Hotel president Hyun Ki Joon and threaten him to get money.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: After being fired from the Ministry of Culture and Tourism, Ah Jung is heart broken and tries hard to get herself reinstated. Meanwhile, she gets help from her friends at the Ministry who send out petitions on her behalf and from a man who puts on a one man demonstration who turns out to be Ki Joon...

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: So Ran is shocked to find out that Jae Bum has left her on the same day that she finds out that she is pregnant... Ah Jung and Ki Joon have a sweet but awkward reunion after being apart for more than a month and finally talks of marriage is in the air but things turn complicated when Ah Jung misses an important appointment with Ki Joon's aunt.
